name: Time Hunter(Demo)
description:
Time Hunter is a 3d platformer. It uses WASD and the spacebar to move, the mouse to look around, and the x/shift keys to dash.

There is NO save function yet, but the game has short enough gameplay that it shouldn't matter.

To play the game, extract the zip file, open the folder, and run timehunter.exe

Music Made by The Music Monkey at https://soundcloud.com/ejgard1109

Time Hunter uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2023, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved
